home.about.title: Why we built InterviewPilot AI
home.about.body:
Interview quality often depends too much on the individual interviewer.
InterviewPilot AI helps teams run structured, fair, and repeatable interviews by generating role-specific questions and scorecards.
This project showcases how I think about product design, AI prompting, and end-to-end experience for hiring teams.

pricing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pricing.faq.q1: Can I try before I buy?
pricing.faq.a1: Yes! The Free plan lets you generate up to 3 interview plans per month with no credit card required. This is a great way to experience the quality of AI-generated questions before upgrading.
pricing.faq.a2: We use Stripe for secure payment processing. You'll be charged at the start of each billing period. Annual plans are billed once per year and save you 17% compared to monthly billing.
pricing.faq.a3: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.
pricing.faq.a4: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for annual plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 14 days of purchase for a full refund.
pricing.enterprise.title: Need a custom solution?
pricing.enterprise.description: For enterprise teams with specific requirements, we offer custom pricing, dedicated support, and tailored onboarding. Let's talk about how InterviewPilot AI can scale with your organization.
